backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles with access control checks, allowing users to view/save their own profiles and exposing a public sitemap URL.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels for multiple About-page-related features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across components, pages, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Asset configuration defining caching rules, content headers, and file-specific overrides for IC deployment.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Detailed deployment checklist covering build validation, error diagnosis, publish directory requirements, and local production preview steps.
frontend/DOMAIN_SETUP.md: Guide explaining DNS, redirect, and SSL configuration for setting up the custom domain sangharshclasses.in on Caffeine hosting.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and global layout styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with full SEO metadata, structured data, favicons, and a script loading the React app from /src/main.tsx.
frontend/public/_headers: Defines custom content types and attachment headers for specific public files.
frontend/public/_redirects: Netlify-style redirects ensuring static files return 200 and all other routes map to index.html.
frontend/public/404.html: HTML fallback that redirects non-static paths to the SPA root except excluded files.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Allows all crawlers and points to the sitemap URL.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing the home and about pages with metadata.
frontend/src/admin/AdminShell.tsx: Empty placeholder for future admin shell component.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminAuthP: Empty placeholder for future admin authentication UI.
Empty placeholder for future admin access gate.
frontend/src/admin/components/AdminToast: Empty placeholder for future admin toast notifications.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Empty placeholder for a delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/admin/components/ProfileSet: Empty placeholder for a profile setup modal.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AboutEditorPage: Empty placeholder for an admin about-page editor.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminHome.tsx: Empty placeholder for admin dashboard home.
Empty placeholder for admin user-management page.
frontend/src/admin/pages/ContactEditorPa: Empty placeholder for admin contact-page editor.
frontend/src/admin/pages/CoursesManagerP: Empty placeholder for admin course-management page.
frontend/src/admin/pages/FacultyManagerP: Empty placeholder for admin faculty-management page.
frontend/src/admin/pages/LayoutSectionsP: Empty placeholder for admin layout-section editor.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with simple pathname-based routing and initialization of diagnostics and SEO guards.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Renders the About section using marketing content with SEO text, Hindi content, and a feature card.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that logs errors and shows a runtime fallback UI on failure.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Displays contact information with buttons for calling, WhatsApp, and email.
frontend/src/components/Courses.tsx: Shows a courses grid and a highlighted extra information section from marketing content.
frontend/src/components/DomainSetupDialo: Empty placeholder for a domain setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/DownloadWebsiteC: Button that triggers download of a static ZIP file of the website code.
frontend/src/components/Faculty.tsx: Displays faculty cards with photos, subjects, roles, and experience details.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with site info, quick links, contact details, and social media icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with scroll-based styling, navigation, and mobile menu using marketing content.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, headings, CTAs, and stats sourced from marketing content.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorFall: Fallback UI showing an error message with options to refresh or return home.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Floating WhatsApp contact button that opens a chat using the configured phone number.
frontend/src/content/marketingSiteConten: Centralized marketing content including site info, hero data, about text, and SEO descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActorSafe.t: Creates a backend actor with optional safe access-control initialization and error-tolerant behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login handling, identity loading, and related status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving caller user profiles using the safe backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables, base styles, animations, and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata handling and dynamic content from marketingSiteContent.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage composing header, hero, faculty, courses, contact, and footer components.
frontend/src/static-export/renderStaticS: Generates static HTML using marketingSiteContent, including header, hero, faculty, and navigation rendering.
frontend/src/static-export/staticExportA: Defines image assets and their destination paths for static export.
frontend/src/static-export/zipWriter.ts: Inâ€‘memory ZIP writer placeholder that tracks added files and can output an empty ZIP.
Empty placeholder file for future content serialization utilities.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeDiagnostics.ts: Provides optional runtime diagnostics for logging errors and component render events.
frontend/src/utils/seoGuards.ts: Implements runtime SEO rules enforcing canonical URLs and noindex on non-canonical domains.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended OKLCH color system, custom animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Defines Vite config with React and a custom plugin that generates static HTML/CSS/JS, copies assets, and creates a ZIP package with post-build verification.
project_state.json: Stores project state, requirements, and known issues related to SEO, content placement, and removal of debug text in the website build.
